mapper.select: SELECT T1.ITM_STR_NO /* 품목입고번호 */ , J1.SVPD_SAP_CD AS SAP_MAT_CD /* SAP자재코드 */ , T1.ITM_PD_CD /* 품목상품코드 */ , J1.SVPD_NM_ABBR1 AS ITM_PD_NM /* 품목상품명 */ , ( SELECT TRIM( F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'WARE_TP_CD', WARE_TP_CD, #{session.langId}) || ' ' || F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'LCT_ANGLE_CD', ITM_LCT_ANGLE_VAL, #{session.langId}) || ' ' || F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'LCT_COF_CD', ITM_LCT_COF_VAL, #{session.langId}) || ' ' || F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'LCT_FLOR_NO_CD', ITM_LCT_FLOR_NO_VAL, #{session.langId}) || ' ' || F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'LCT_MAT_GRP_CD', ITM_LCT_MAT_GRP_CD, #{session.langId})) FROM TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_LCT_IZ /* 고객서비스품목위치내역 */ WHERE ITM_PD_CD = T1.ITM_PD_CD AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND WARE_NO = CASE WHEN T4.STD_WARE_USE_YN = 'Y' THEN '200012' /* 표준적용 */ ELSE T1.OSTR_WARE_NO END ) AS ITEM_LOC /* 품목위치 */ , NVL((SELECT (CASE T1.ITM_GD_CD WHEN 'A' THEN S3.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY - S3.MMT_STOC_A_GD_QTY WHEN 'B' THEN S3.PITM_STOC_B_GD_QTY - S3.MMT_STOC_B_GD_QTY WHEN 'E' THEN S3.PITM_STOC_E_GD_QTY - S3.MMT_STOC_E_GD_QTY WHEN 'R' THEN S3.PITM_STOC_R_GD_QTY - S3.MMT_STOC_R_GD_QTY ELSE 0 END) FROM TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ S3 WHERE S3.WARE_NO = T1.STR_WARE_NO AND S3.ITM_PD_CD = T1.ITM_PD_CD AND S3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') ,0) AS ON_QTY /* 시점재고수량 */ , T1.MNGT_UNIT_CD /* 관리단위코드*/ , (SELECT F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'MNGT_UNIT_CD', T1.MNGT_UNIT_CD) FROM DUAL) AS MNGT_UNIT_NM /* 관리단위명 */ , T1.ITM_GD_CD /* 품목등급코드 */ , J1.SVPD_BOX_QTY AS BOX_UNIT_QTY /* 박스단위수량 */ , T2.OSTR_AK_QTY /* 출고요청수량 */ , T3.OSTR_QTY /* 출고수량 */ , T1.STR_QTY /* 입고수량 */ , (NVL(T2.OSTR_CNFM_QTY,0) - NVL(T2.OSTR_AGG_QTY,0)) AS OSTR_CNFM_AGG_QTY /* 출고확정누계수량 */ , T1.STR_RGST_DT /* 입고등록일자 */ , T1.STR_WARE_NO /* 입고창고번호 */ , T1.OSTR_WARE_NO /* 출고창고번호 */ , J1.SVPD_BASE_GB AS BASE_GB /* 기본구분 */ , J1.SVPD_BASE_COLOR_GB AS BASE_COLOR_GB/* 기본컬러구분 */ , T2.STR_HOP_DT /* 입고희망일자 */ , T2.OSTR_CNFM_CD /* 출고확정코드 */ , (SELECT NVL(SUM(S1.OSTR_QTY),0) FROM TB_SVST_ITM_OSTR_IZ S1 WHERE S1.OSTR_AK_NO = T1.OSTR_AK_NO AND S1.OSTR_AK_SN = T1.OSTR_AK_SN AND S1.OSTR_AK_NO LIKE '360%' AND S1.SELL_RCPDT IS NOT NULL AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) IN_SUM /* 출고수량합계 */ , T1.STR_CONF_DT /* 입고확인일자*/ , T3.RMK_CN /* 비고 */ , T3.OSTR_SN /* 출고순번 */ , T1.STR_SN /* 입고순번 */ FROM TB_SVST_ITM_STR_IZ T1 /* 품목입고내역 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVST_ITM_OSTR_AK_IZ T2 /* 품목출고요청내역 */ ON T1.OSTR_AK_NO = T2.OSTR_AK_NO AND T1.OSTR_AK_SN = T2.OSTR_AK_SN AND T1.ITM_PD_CD = T2.ITM_PD_CD AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVST_ITM_OSTR_IZ T3 /* 품목출고내역*/ ON T1.ITM_OSTR_NO = T3.ITM_OSTR_NO AND T1.OSTR_SN = T3.OSTR_SN AND T1.ITM_PD_CD = T3.ITM_PD_CD AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN () J1 ON T1.ITM_PD_CD = J1.SVPD_PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ T4 /* 월별창고내역(출고) */ ON T4.APY_YM = NVL(SUBSTR(T1.STR_RGST_DT, 1, 6), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM')) AND T4.WARE_NO = T1.OSTR_WARE_NO INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ T5 /* 월별창고내역(입고) */ ON T5.APY_YM = NVL(SUBSTR(T1.STR_RGST_DT, 1, 6), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM')) AND T5.WARE_NO = T1.STR_WARE_NO WHERE T1.ITM_STR_NO = #{itmStrNo} AND T1.STR_WARE_NO = #{strWareNo} AND T1.OSTR_WARE_NO = #{ostrWareNo} AND T1.STR_TP_CD = #{strTpCd} AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY T1.STR_SN
mapper.update:
UPDATE TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ T1 /* 고객서비스품목재고내역 */ SET T1.MMT_STOC_A_GD_QTY = CASE WHEN (T1.MMT_STOC_A_GD_QTY - DECODE( #{itmGdCd}, 'A', #{strQty},0)) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE (T1.MMT_STOC_A_GD_QTY - DECODE( #{itmGdCd}, 'A', #{strQty},0)) END , T1.MMT_STOC_B_GD_QTY = CASE WHEN (T1.MMT_STOC_B_GD_QTY - DECODE( #{itmGdCd}, 'B', #{strQty},0)) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE (T1.MMT_STOC_B_GD_QTY - DECODE( #{itmGdCd}, 'B', #{strQty},0)) END , T1.MMT_STOC_E_GD_QTY = CASE WHEN (T1.MMT_STOC_E_GD_QTY - DECODE( #{itmGdCd}, 'E', #{strQty},0)) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE (T1.MMT_STOC_E_GD_QTY - DECODE( #{itmGdCd}, 'E', #{strQty},0)) END , T1.MMT_STOC_R_GD_QTY = CASE WHEN (T1.MMT_STOC_R_GD_QTY - DECODE( #{itmGdCd}, 'R', #{strQty},0)) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE (T1.MMT_STOC_R_GD_QTY - DECODE( #{itmGdCd}, 'R', #{strQty},0)) END
WHERE T1.WARE_NO = #{strWareNo} AND T1.ITM_PD_CD = #{itmPdCd}

UPDATE TB_SVST_ITM_STR_IZ /* 품목입고내역 */ SET STR_CONF_DT = NULL , STR_CONF_HH = NULL , STR_CONF_PRTNR_NO = NULL , STR_CONF_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = NULL
WHERE ITM_STR_NO = #{itmStrNo} AND STR_SN = #{strSn}

UPDATE TB_SVST_ITM_OSTR_IZ /* 품목출고내역 */ SET STR_CONF_DT = NULL , STR_CONF_HH = NULL , STR_CONF_PRTNR_NO = NULL , STR_CONF_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = NULL
WHERE ITM_STR_NO = #{itmStrNo} AND STR_SN = #{strSn}

UPDATE TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ /* 고객서비스품목재고내역 */ SET MMT_STOC_A_GD_QTY = CASE WHEN NVL(MMT_STOC_A_GD_QTY, 0) + CASE WHEN #{itemGdCd} = 'A' THEN #{strQty} ELSE 0 END < 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(MMT_STOC_A_GD_QTY, 0) + CASE WHEN #{itemGdCd} = 'A' THEN #{strQty} ELSE 0 END END , MMT_STOC_B_GD_QTY = CASE WHEN NVL(MMT_STOC_B_GD_QTY, 0) + CASE WHEN #{itemGdCd} = 'B' THEN #{strQty} ELSE 0 END < 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(MMT_STOC_B_GD_QTY, 0) + CASE WHEN #{itemGdCd} = 'B' THEN #{strQty} ELSE 0 END END , MMT_STOC_E_GD_QTY = CASE WHEN NVL(MMT_STOC_E_GD_QTY, 0) + CASE WHEN #{itemGdCd} = 'E' THEN #{strQty} ELSE 0 END < 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(MMT_STOC_E_GD_QTY, 0) + CASE WHEN #{itemGdCd} = 'E' THEN #{strQty} ELSE 0 END END , MMT_STOC_R_GD_QTY = CASE WHEN NVL(MMT_STOC_R_GD_QTY, 0) + CASE WHEN #{itemGdCd} = 'R' THEN #{strQty} ELSE 0 END < 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(MMT_STOC_R_GD_QTY, 0) + CASE WHEN #{itemGdCd} = 'R' THEN #{strQty} ELSE 0 END END
WHERE WARE_NO = #{strWareNo} AND ITM_PD_CD = #{itmPdCd}
